item.description:
http://www.wapack.org/kidder.html

Easy to moderate grades, approximately 3 miles round trip.

Many blueberries on the top, ready to be picked.

Ralph and I checked out this area and think that we will be able to view Jaffrey fireworks from this point which is only about six miles from the airport.

Night hike: headlamp, flashlight, etc., food and drinks. Jacket and bug stuff!
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot north side of 123/124 or along the street above Windblown

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Jaffrey Fireworks - Kidder Mountain - 1,814'
